text: Maureen Bruno Roy is a United States cyclocross and mountain bike racer. She has competed in 2 UCI Cyclocross World Championships on the US National Team. She has been a four time US National Cyclocross champion in both the single speed and masters division, and has earned a bronze medal in the elite field. She won the single speed cyclocross World Championship in Louisville KY in 2014. Bruno Roy announced her retirement from professional racing in 2015. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Maureen Bruno Roy
